solution_line_template: Woody needs to save another ${console_cost} - ${money_already_has} = $<<{console_cost}-{money_already_has}={money_needed}>>{money_needed} to be able to afford a games console
It will take Woody ${money_needed} / ${weekly_allowance}/week = <<{money_needed}/{weekly_allowance}={weeks_to_save}>>{weeks_to_save} weeks to save up enough money
